name: INNER DEMONS (Wanooknox)
description:
Made by team KryoCos.

Face your inner demons in this bullet hell game with a twist. You have no weapons, only a shield. How will you dig through your shell to face your demons?

Please Rate Us: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/inner-demons

Controls:

* Move - WASD/Left Stick

* Aim - Mouse/Right Stick

* Menu Buttons - Left Mouse Click

Music from:

* https://audionautix.com

  * BlackFly

  * Horror13

* https://www.freesoundtrackmusic.com

  * Doom and Gloom by Steve O'Connell

Sound Effects created by us using jsfxr: https://sfxr.me/
